attributes.comment:
We are currently in the process of adopting a child from China. It has come to
our attention that our I 171-H form will expire before we return home with our
child. Already faced with the expense of the adoption process as well as
preparing for her arrival, we are faced with not only submitting another form,
but with the increase in fees, which we find outrageous. Can you please tell us,
did our fingerprints change? How can anyone justify these fees? Why is it not
possible to extend our form as long as needed. Why is our own government making
it so difficult for us to complete this process? Mr. and Mrs. Keith Singer

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kristie S. Singer
